Class Product

java.lang.Object
com.group18.model.Product
public class Product extends Object
Represents a product with details such as ID, name, type, price, stock, and image data. This class provides constructors and methods for creating, modifying, and retrieving product information.

  • Field Details

    • productId

      private int productId
      Represents the unique identifier for a product. This identifier is used to distinguish individual products within the system.

    • productName

      private String productName
      Represents the name of the product. This attribute is used to uniquely identify or provide a descriptive name for the product.

    • productType

      private String productType
      Represents the type of the product. This field is restricted to specific predefined values: 'beverage', 'biscuit', or 'toy'. It is used to categorize the product within these defined types.

    • price

      private BigDecimal price
      Represents the price of the product. The price is stored as a BigDecimal to maintain precision, especially for currency values.

    • stock

      private int stock
      Represents the quantity of the product available in stock. This value is used to track inventory levels for the product.

    • imageData

      private byte[] imageData
      Represents the image data related to the product. This field stores the binary data of an image associated with the product. It is useful for rendering the product image in applications or storing it for later use.

  • Constructor Details

    • Product

      public Product()
      Default constructor for the Product class. Creates an instance of Product with no initial values set. Useful in scenarios where properties are assigned post-creation.

    • Product

      public Product(String productName, String productType, BigDecimal price, int stock, byte[] imageData)
      Constructs a new Product instance with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      productName - the name of the product
      productType - the type or category of the product
      price - the price of the product
      stock - the stock quantity of the product
      imageData - the image data of the product represented as a byte array

    • Product

      public Product(int productId, String productName, String productType, BigDecimal price, int stock, byte[] imageData)
      Constructor for creating a Product with all attributes, including an existing product ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - the unique identifier of the product
      productName - the name of the product
      productType - the category or type of the product
      price - the price of the product as a BigDecimal
      stock - the quantity of the product in stock
      imageData - the image data of the product as a byte array

    • Product

      public Product(String productName, String productType, BigDecimal price, int stock)
      Constructs a new Product instance without an image path for compatibility with older implementations.
      Parameters:
      productName - the name of the product
      productType - the type or category of the product
      price - the price of the product
      stock - the stock quantity of the product

    • Product

      public Product(int productId, String productName, String productType, BigDecimal price, int stock)
      Constructs a Product object with the specified product ID, name, type, price, and stock. This constructor is intended for usage when an existing product ID needs to be specified.
      Parameters:
      productId - the unique identifier for the product
      productName - the name of the product
      productType - the type or category of the product
      price - the price of the product
      stock - the stock quantity available for the product

  • Method Details

    • getImageData

      public byte[] getImageData()
      Retrieves the image data associated with the product.
      Returns:
      a byte array representing the image data of the product, or null if no image data is set.

    • setImageData

      public void setImageData(byte[] imageData)
      Sets the image data for this product.
      Parameters:
      imageData - the byte array representing the image data of the product

    • getImage

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getImage()
      Retrieves the image associated with a product, if image data is available. Converts the stored byte array of image data into an Image object.
      Returns:
      An Image object created from the existing image data, or null if no image data is available.

    • getProductId

      public int getProductId()
      Retrieves the unique identifier of the product.
      Returns:
      the product ID

    • setProductId

      public void setProductId(int productId)
      Sets the product ID for the product.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID to set for the product

    • getProductName

      public String getProductName()
      Retrieves the name of the product.
      Returns:
      the name of the product as a String

    • setProductName

      public void setProductName(String productName)
      Sets the name of the product.
      Parameters:
      productName - the name of the product to be set

    • getProductType

      public String getProductType()
      Retrieves the product type of this product.
      Returns:
      the product type as a String

    • setProductType

      public void setProductType(String productType)
      Sets the type of the product.
      Parameters:
      productType - the type of the product to be set

    • getPrice

      public BigDecimal getPrice()
      Retrieves the price of the product.
      Returns:
      the price of the product as a BigDecimal

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice(BigDecimal price)
      Sets the price of the product.
      Parameters:
      price - the price to set for the product

    • getStock

      public int getStock()
      Retrieves the current stock quantity of the product.
      Returns:
      the stock quantity of the product

    • setStock

      public void setStock(int stock)
      Updates the stock quantity of the product.
      Parameters:
      stock - the new stock quantity to be set
